casebody.data:
Before Pryor, P. J., and Giegerich, J.

Elvira Purdy, Appellant, v. The Manhattan Railway Co. and Another, Respondents. S. G. Adams, for appellant. Davies & Rapallo, for respondents. Appeal from judgment of this court, Bischofe, J.

Judgment reversed, new trial ordered, costs to abide the event. See ante, page 50.
